Positive_Review: Amazing decor vibe and location The staff was very friendly and the rooms are beautiful The hotel bar is also an amazing fun bar The location is perfect for sightseeing without being in the middle of the chaos

Negative_Review: It is expensive for a hotel that doesn t have a pool gym or spa Also the menu at lunch is the same menu for dinner as well as room service On top of that it is quite limited especially if you are vegetarian However they do offer afternoon tea which I didn t get to try but looked lovely
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic and the bedroom is beautiful Most importantly it is quiet
It was such a quirky spot with a lot of personality Actually felt like I was in London perhaps in a different time though and the staff were exceptionally friendly I would definitely stay there again

lovely small cozy hotel very comfortable and quiet with an excellent cocktail bar if you re looking for something different Staff were very helpful and friendly breakfast good although eggs were overcooked location is great and we were lucky enough to get a discount for the room so it was also good value we felt very at home and i would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: The room could have benefited from a full length mirror felt like I was dressing blind
Positive_Review: I called the morning of my check in and found out my room was ready at 7 30 a m which was a huge relief after hopping off a night train and assuming I wouldn t have my room until 3 p m Reception was always incredibly helpful despite my frequent calls They were friendly courteous and relaxed which made me feel right at home and I could really tell they genuinely cared about my comfort Bed was great especially after a long day out Heated towel rack was a savior The small bottles in the fridge of their house cocktails were an adorable touch

Negative_Review: No milk in room and didn t fancy requesting it while wrapped in a towel coffee percolater not brilliant but still a lovely hotel
Positive_Review: Lovely decor comfy big bed lovely polite staff

Negative_Review: Nothing really Just make sure it is the type of place you would like
Positive_Review: Different hotel Not your run of the mill establishment Small cozy could be a bit too cozy for some with a bar dominating the entrance Great location for West End visitors

Negative_Review: a bit more options on the food in the evening we were looking for a meal rather than bar food but we stayed as the ambience was lovely
Positive_Review: we were kindly upgraded very nice thank you The hotel d cor and the general atmosphere was superb we had a lovely weekend

Negative_Review: My mother in law banged her head on a piece of pretruding furniture in her room They emailed the hotel to let them now and prevent it from happening to other guests but didn t get a reply
Positive_Review: Loved the quirky bar lounge area Rooms beautifully colourfully and uniquely decorated Brilliant location

Negative_Review: Pillows desperately need to ventilate or replace to new ones
Positive_Review: Super nice staff Cozy place Restaurant with wonderful and delicious surprises Beautiful bathroom in the room

Negative_Review: The breakfast should be a bit upgraded to the same perfect level as the rest of the hotel
Positive_Review: Wonderful at home comfort feeling Superb Boutique Hotel in perfect form
The interior decoration and attention to details of the decor are exceptional very cosy atmosphere Friendly and attentive staff and to top it delicious desserts and cocktails

Negative_Review: Gave me a room underground Lower ground although I ve asked for a high floor There are windows and light coming in At the first night there was no option to change the room Later they did offer but we got used to it and it was Ok They Charged me in my local currency 3 5 of extra payment fee for what althouhg I have asked to be charged in pounds No refrigirator
Positive_Review: The location is very good Very close to marble arch and oxford street Room well decorated and very clean Staff very friendly and helpful Breakfast is high quaity but not too many options

Negative_Review: Well It s not really a hotel so don t expect those types of amenities There is really no reception when you walk through the front door you literally walk into their bar which is super nice by the way There are very limited food options snacks basically and no dining options Although within a few metres from the front door there are several great dining options Because I was there on business it should be noted that the bedroom was not so great for doing work the desk is an antique and so was the chair meaning pretty uncomfortable So not great for the business traveler but awesome for a weekend getaway
Positive_Review: Very nice atmosphere room details and finishes are of a very high standard

Negative_Review: Construction work nearby But didn t bother me much Some door and window knobs need fixing Left a note about it They probably fixed them already Will check next time I book there
Positive_Review: A catch in London Generally quiet and wonderful helpful staff Didn t feel very busy Bed was comfy but the best part was the design it s a proper boutique hotel

Negative_Review: Big step up into the shower which is in the bath are baths really necessary in 2016 cocktail bar is cosy but didn t sell regular cocktails like mojitos which is a shame
Positive_Review: Location is brilliant rooms are well furnished bed very comfortable fixtures and fittings all lovely the hotel has a really warm and welcoming feel and the staff are friendly and welcoming

We loved the little things that made a difference an Australian adapter in the room on arrival the refurbished classic cast iron radiator as a towel rail the Roberts radio Bluetooth speaker and a hot water bottle Then of course there s the usual stuff friendly and professional service a super comfortable bed and pillows and beautiful bathroom that could only be English

Negative_Review: The size of the room was tiny which is familiar in London
Positive_Review: The check in and out was so smooth The staff receipant was cordial The bed was comfortable The location was excellent

Negative_Review: All their deluxe room s bathrooms are equipped with disability features At first sight it does not give a pleasant feeling if you ain t one Some deluxe room bathrooms should be without those features Though if your pocket permits go for the next category
Positive_Review: Excellent Location Extremely cozy and private place Ideal for romantic couples and not advisable for bigger families or groups Most beautiful and comfy bar in the neighborhood though a little pricey The moment you walk in it gives a feeling of home Wish I could extend my stay for a little longer

Negative_Review: The bed was a little hard I was too hot with the down comforter and there was no top sheet
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and helpful It was also in an excellent location Close to the tube and walkable for meals
Fantastic hotel a real gem in London Private attentive service room are great and the location could not be better They also recommend good restaurant around And best it is perfectly priced

Negative_Review: Not much privacy once the curtains were open Our room seem to be in direct view from the other rooms across the street It would have been better to have blinds to allow natural light and privacy
Positive_Review: Nice and clean and the staff were very friendly

Negative_Review: Booked 4 poster bed Was given club room as this was ready and told this was an upgrade When researched found this was a less expensive room than was booked and charged for While waiting for room to become available was offered a coffee and found this charged to my bill at the end of my stay Felt misled and cheated on both counts
Positive_Review: Good location Comfortable bed Clean Querky

Negative_Review: If I had more time to enjoy the bar and eating area next time
Positive_Review: Loved the d cor I had to change arrangements dates of stay while I was there and the staff made it all too easy I needed a cab and the staff went our of there way to track one down not just flag from street as there were none

Situated in a great area close to Marble Arch tube station an excellent Gastro Pub just round the corner lovely coffee shops and restaurants just a short walk away Really friendly staff nothing was too much trouble will definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: I would have liked an iron
Positive_Review: Coming in from the rain it was like walking into a wonderfully welcoming home I just wished I hadn t arrived so late so I could have enjoyed a glass of wine in the very cosy bar I really liked you could have fresh milk in the room and that there was a cafetiere and fresh coffee

Negative_Review: Service at breakfast was really disappointing We were told we couldn t have cappuccinos but strangely heard another couple order a cappuccino successfully The milk given to my wife for her filter coffee was actually off Ketchup had to be requested several times And the doors to the staircases all had sticky handles a bit yuck
Positive_Review: Very trendy we stayed in the room with the Union Jack four poster bed Check in staff were friendly and helpful
We really enjoyed our stay here the hotel has a great location staf is very friendly and the room was very nice A really great place to stay while in london

Negative_Review: Room was a little on the small side but I suppose that just increased its coziness
Positive_Review: Bed was amazing and very comfortable Great selection in minibar Staff were friendliest I have met in a hotel and I have been in many

Negative_Review: based on my needs nothing missing if i was staying longer the facilities were minimal i would prefer i walk in shower with a bigger shower head but frankly that is just being picky
Positive_Review: great staff comfortable bed great spot great bar

Negative_Review: I believe you could still improve on the breakfast buffet More choice like bread and improve the presentation If you re offering some fruit salad and granola make sure it looks fresh
Positive_Review: No Positive
The staff were superb As a young gay couple we are never sure how we will be treated and this establishment is top class professional Would stay again for sure

Such a classy little place very clean and comfortable and so well delivered much better than the usual large hotel experience and every bit as luxurious Good location within a couple minutes stroll to Marble Arch and with Hyde Park walks equally close Recommended
Excellent staff and location Good size room for London Excellent cocktails
The whole experience from arrival to departure
Super comfy bed Stylish decor and friendly staff we loved it
